primeAdvantages.name: Logistical Benefit
primeAdvantages.description: The unit has excellent logistical support
primeAdvantages.effect: Add one Battlefield Role slot of your choice to the detachment
restrictions: Cannot add slots that would exceed detachment limits

primeAdvantages.name: The Unfavoured
primeAdvantages.description: Iron Warriors unit that is considered expendable by their commanders
primeAdvantages.effect: The unit gains the Expendable (1) special rule
